item.title: Customize source generator output location
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The output location of code created by a Roslyn source generator can be customized, so that the output file can be included in source control (to be included in code reviews for example). This post will give a brief overview of source generators, and then show the default behavior and how it can be customized. This post will not go into detail regarding the finer details of source generators - if you would like more details on source generators, see the reference links below.
